title: Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park: Ranger Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours     Ranger Guided Tours                Ranger Guided Tours         A park ranger gives an interpretive talk at the Wright Memorial. NPS Photo  Ranger Programs  Dates: Memorial Day through Labor Day* Time: 10:30 am Locations: Wright-Dunbar Interpretive Center & Huffman Prairie Interpretive Center Fees: No Fees  Come to the park for ranger programs* during the summer (Memorial day to Labor day).  Tours are available at both Visitor Centers.  A park ranger will offer an interpretive program* at 10:30 am on various subjects that may include a neighborhood walk of the Wright-Dunbar neighborhood, the Wright memorial, Huffman prairie, the Wright bicycle company, Dunbar's poetry, and many other topics.   x   * Due to staffing shortages, tours may not be available every day.  Please call the Visitor Center prior to your visit to inquire if a tour will be scheduled for that day.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.
